articles.description: Relentless coughing after a viral infection can be frustrating and worrisome, but in most cases, coughs resolve over time. The Good Brigade/DigitalVision via...
articles.content: When was the last time you walked into a public space and didnt hear someone coughing? After three years of flinching at the sound, it can be disarming to hear so many people coughing and embarrassin… [+7231 chars]
